CY.name: PROJECT X ZONE
CY.description: THE BIGGEST BATTLE IN GAME HISTORY IS ABOUT TO BEGIN! When a rift in time and space suddenly appears, a doorway to various universes is opened allowing both heroes and villains from different worlds to cross paths. Players will be able to take control of a massive selection of heroes including favourites such as Jin and Xiaoyu (TEKKEN), Toma and Cyrille (Shining Force EXA), to X and Zero (Mega Man X) and discover the cause of the rift and stop evil from coming through and spreading into their world. THE BIGGEST ROSTER EVER: Enjoy over 50 characters from 29 franchises from Namco Bandai, Capcom & Sega, including Street Fighter, Tekken, Darkstalkers, Devil May Cry, Sakura Wars, Tales of Vesperia and many more ! *Game with English text only*

AU.name: PROJECT X ZONE
AU.description: THE BIGGEST BATTLE IN GAME HISTORY IS ABOUT TO BEGIN! When a rift in time and space suddenly appears, a doorway to various universes is opened allowing both heroes and villains from different worlds to cross paths. Players will be able to take control of a massive selection of heroes including favourites such as Jin and Xiaoyu (TEKKEN), Toma and Cyrille (Shining Force EXA), to X and Zero (Mega Man X) and discover the cause of the rift and stop evil from coming through and spreading into their world. THE BIGGEST ROSTER EVER: Enjoy over 50 characters from 29 franchises from Namco Bandai, Capcom & Sega, including Street Fighter, Tekken, Darkstalkers, Devil May Cry, Sakura Wars, Tales of Vesperia and many more ! *Game with English text only*

CH.name: PROJECT X ZONE
CH.description: DER GRÖSSTE KAMPF DER GESCHICHTE BEGINNT! Als sich plötzlich ein Riss in Zeit und Raum auftut, ist der Zugang zu verschiedenen Universen sowohl für Helden als auch für Schurken aus unterschiedlichen Welten geöffnet. Die Spieler können zwischen zahlreichen Helden wählen, wie beispielsweise Jin und Xiaoyu (TEKKEN), Toma und Cyrille (Shining Force EXA) und X und Zero (Mega Man X), um der Ursache für den Riss auf den Grund zu gehen und zu verhindern, dass das Böse in ihre Welt eindringt. DIE GRÖSSTE CHARAKTERAUSWAHL ALLER ZEITEN: Spiele über 50 Charaktere aus 29 Spieleklassikern von Namco Bandai, Capcom & Sega, unter anderem aus Street Fighter, Tekken, Darkstalkers, Devil May Cry, Sakura Wars und Tales of Vesperia! *Das Spiel ist nur in Englisch verfügbar*

BG.name: PROJECT X ZONE
BG.description: THE BIGGEST BATTLE IN GAME HISTORY IS ABOUT TO BEGIN! When a rift in time and space suddenly appears, a doorway to various universes is opened allowing both heroes and villains from different worlds to cross paths. Players will be able to take control of a massive selection of heroes including favourites such as Jin and Xiaoyu (TEKKEN), Toma and Cyrille (Shining Force EXA), to X and Zero (Mega Man X) and discover the cause of the rift and stop evil from coming through and spreading into their world. THE BIGGEST ROSTER EVER: Enjoy over 50 characters from 29 franchises from Namco Bandai, Capcom & Sega, including Street Fighter, Tekken, Darkstalkers, Devil May Cry, Sakura Wars, Tales of Vesperia and many more ! *Game with English text only*

BE.name: PROJECT X ZONE
BE.description: LA PLUS GRANDE BATAILLE DE L'HISTOIRE DU JEU VIDÉO EST SUR LE POINT DE COMMENCER ! Quand une faille dans le temps et dans l'espace apparaît soudainement, une porte vers différents univers s'ouvre, permettant à la fois aux héros et aux super-vilains de différents mondes de croiser leurs routes. Les joueurs seront en mesure de prendre le contrôle d'une grande sélection de héros, dont des favoris, tels que Jin et Xiaoyu (Tekken), Toma et Cyrille (Shining Force EXA), ainsi que X et zéro (Mega Man X) et de découvrir la cause de la faille, afin d'empêcher le mal de s'engouffrer au travers et de se répandre dans leur monde. LA PLUS GRANDE LISTE JAMAIS VUE AUPARAVANT : profitez de plus de 50 personnages tirés des 29 franchises de Namco Bandai, Capcom & Sega, avec entre autres Street Fighter, Tekken, Darkstalkers, Devil May Cry, Sakura Wars, Tales of Vesperia et bien plus encore ! *Texte du jeu uniquement en anglais*

ES.name: PROJECT X ZONE
ES.description: ¡LA MAYOR BATALLA DE LA HISTORIA DE LOS VIDEOJUEGOS ESTÁ A PUNTO DE COMENZAR! Se ha abierto una grieta en el espacio-tiempo y, con ella, la puerta a varios universos; ahora, héroes y villanos de diferentes mundos ven cómo sus caminos se cruzan. Los jugadores podrán encarnar a muchos de sus héroes favoritos, como Jin y Xiaoyu (TEKKEN), Toma y Cyrille (Shining Force EXA) o X y Zero (Mega Man X), con el objetivo de descubrir el origen de la grieta y evitar que el mal de su interior se expanda por sus mundos. EL MAYOR PLANTEL DE LA HISTORIA: disfruta de más de 50 personajes de 29 franquicias de Namco Bandai, Capcom y Sega, tales como Street Fighter, Tekken, Darkstalkers, Devil May Cry, Sakura Wars, Tales of Vesperia y muchas más. *Textos del juego solo disponibles en inglés*

SE.name: PROJECT X ZONE
SE.description: THE BIGGEST BATTLE IN GAME HISTORY IS ABOUT TO BEGIN! Players will be able to take control of a massive selection of heroes including favourites such as Jin and Xiaoyu (TEKKEN), Toma and Cyrille (Shining Force EXA), to X and Zero (Mega Man X) and discover the cause of the rift and stop evil from coming through and spreading into their world. THE BIGGEST ROSTER EVER: Enjoy over 50 characters from 29 franchises from Namco Bandai, Capcom & Sega, including Street Fighter, Tekken, Darkstalkers, Devil May Cry, Sakura Wars, Tales of Vesperia and many more ! *Game with English text only*

NL.name: PROJECT X ZONE
NL.description: DE GROOTSTE STRIJD UIT DE GAMINGGESCHIEDENIS BEGINT! Door een scheur in tijd en ruimte wordt een deur naar verschillende universa geopend en komen helden en schurken uit allerlei werelden tegenover elkaar te staan. Je kunt uit een indrukwekkend aantal helden kiezen, zoals Jin en Xiaoyu (TEKKEN), Toma en Cyrille (Shining Force EXA) en X en Zero (Mega Man X). Ontdek hoe de scheur ontstaan is en voorkom dat het kwaad dat er doorheen komt, zich over je wereld verspreidt. DE GROOTSTE VECHTERS OOIT: meer dan 50 personages uit 29 gameseries van Namco Bandai, Capcom & Sega, zoals Street Fighter, Tekken, Darkstalkers, Devil May Cry, Sakura Wars, Tales of Vesperia en nog veel meer! *Engelstalige game*

NZ.name: PROJECT X ZONE
NZ.description: THE BIGGEST BATTLE IN GAME HISTORY IS ABOUT TO BEGIN! When a rift in time and space suddenly appears, a doorway to various universes is opened allowing both heroes and villains from different worlds to cross paths. Players will be able to take control of a massive selection of heroes including favourites such as Jin and Xiaoyu (TEKKEN), Toma and Cyrille (Shining Force EXA), to X and Zero (Mega Man X) and discover the cause of the rift and stop evil from coming through and spreading into their world. THE BIGGEST ROSTER EVER: Enjoy over 50 characters from 29 franchises from Namco Bandai, Capcom & Sega, including Street Fighter, Tekken, Darkstalkers, Devil May Cry, Sakura Wars, Tales of Vesperia and many more ! *Game with English text only*

RU.name: PROJECT X ZONE
RU.description: СКОРО НАЧНЕТСЯ КРУПНЕЙШАЯ БИТВА В ИГРОВОЙ ИСТОРИИ! После внезапного появления разрыва пространства и времени открылся проход в разные вселенные, позволив встретиться героям и злодеям, обитавшим в них. Игроки смогут управлять множеством героев, включая таких любимцев, как Jin и Xiaoyu (Tekken), Toma и Cyrille (Shining Force EXA), X и Zero (Mega Man X), стараясь узнать причину возникновения разрыва и помешать злу проникнуть в мир и распространиться по нему. ЕСТЬ ИЗ КОГО ВЫБРАТЬ! Вас ждут более 50 персонажей из 29 игровых серий от компаний Namco Bandai, Capcom и Sega, включая Street Fighter, Tekken, Darkstalkers, Devil May Cry, Sakura Wars, Tales of Vesperia и многие другие! *Игра только на английском языке*

RO.name: PROJECT X ZONE
RO.description: THE BIGGEST BATTLE IN GAME HISTORY IS ABOUT TO BEGIN! When a rift in time and space suddenly appears, a doorway to various universes is opened allowing both heroes and villains from different worlds to cross paths. Players will be able to take control of a massive selection of heroes including favourites such as Jin and Xiaoyu (TEKKEN), Toma and Cyrille (Shining Force EXA), to X and Zero (Mega Man X) and discover the cause of the rift and stop evil from coming through and spreading into their world. IT.name: PROJECT X ZONE
IT.description: LA PIÙ GRANDE BATTAGLIA DELLA STORIA DEI VIDEOGIOCHI STA PER INIZIARE!STA PER INIZIARE! Quando un varco dimensionale appare all'improvviso, si apre una porta tra gli universi e così eroi e cattivi provenienti da mondi differenti si trovano a incrociare la propria strada. Prendi il controllo di un numero spropositato di eroi come Jin e Xiaoyu (TEKKEN), Toma e Cyrille (Shining Force EXA), X e Zero (Mega Man X), scopri cosa ha causato il varco dimensionale e impedisci al male di invadere il mondo. LA PIÙ GRANDE SQUADRA DI SEMPRE: più di 50 personaggi provenienti da 29 serie di Namco Bandai, Capcom e Sega, inclusi Street Fighter, Tekken, Darkstalkers, Devil May Cry, Sakura Wars, Tales of Vesperia e molte altre! *Testo del gioco disponibile solo in inglese*

SI.name: PROJECT X ZONE
SI.description: THE BIGGEST BATTLE IN GAME HISTORY IS ABOUT TO BEGIN! When a rift in time and space suddenly appears, a doorway to various universes is opened allowing both heroes and villains from different worlds to cross paths. Players will be able to take control of a massive selection of heroes including favourites such as Jin and Xiaoyu (TEKKEN), Toma and Cyrille (Shining Force EXA), to X and Zero (Mega Man X) and discover the cause of the rift and stop evil from coming through and spreading into their world. PT.name: PROJECT X ZONE
PT.description: A MAIOR BATALHA DA HISTÓRIA DOS JOGOS ESTÁ PRESTES A COMEÇAR! Quando uma brecha no tempo e espaço surge subitamente, é aberta uma porta para os vários universos permitindo que tanto heróis como vilões, de mundos diferentes, cruzem caminhos. Os jogadores poderão controlar uma selecção massiva de heróis, incluindo os favoritos como: Jin e Xiaoyu (TEKKEN), Toma e Cyrille (Shining Force EXA), X e Zero (Mega Man X) e descobrir a causa da brecha impedindo o Mal de entrar e espalhar-se pelo seu mundo. A MAIOR LISTA DE SEMPRE: desfruta de mais de 50 personagens de 29 franchises desde Namco Bandai, Capcom e Sega, incluíndo Street Fighter, Tekken, Darkstalkers, Devil May Cry, Sakura Wars, Tales of Vesperia e muito mais! *Jogo com texto apenas em inglês*
